website_summaries.verdict: The Acer Aspire Switch 10 E is a detachable-hybrid tablet that offers versatility, ample storage, and more than 13 hours of battery life at a very affordable price.
pros: More than 13 hours of battery life in testing
Bright In-Plane Switching (IPS) screen with wide viewing angles
Included keyboard also adds hard drive storage

customer_reviews.title: Won't hold a charge & stopped accepting a charge.
customer_reviews.text: Tablet did come upgraded to Windows 10 as specified and worked fine for a while. I really only got to use it a couple times before it stopped holding a charge. It would be connected to the wall charger and show to be charging but would still drop in battery percentage even on standby. Then after that the tablet stopped charging at all. Requested a refund and was told I'm outside of the warranty period, of course. If it stayed working this would have been a great tablet.
customer_reviews.author: JennW

customer_reviews.title: NOT DROID:  Which is a good thing.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife when the last one (Droid powered) died to a pushed update and became a dinner plate. Got it for the Operating system more than the manufacturer because I am not in the business of paying for other's mistakes. After a year it is still working like gangbusters.
customer_reviews.author: John F. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: absolute P0S
customer_reviews.text: an absolute piece of sh1t, windows 10 is worthless, dell is worthless, & microsoft is worthless. camera quit, and the damn warranty i purchased for it, they refuse to help. amazon has let me down again absolute garbage just as bad as their damn security cameras. i'll go to walmart or new egg from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Oldsoldier10

customer_reviews.title: Love at First Touch
customer_reviews.text: I got a refurbished version and it indeed came with Windows 10. The tablet is snappier than I expected. Upgrading from my Dell Venue 8 Pro, this tablet has a pretty decent form factor for me. Aside from the screen being very easy to smudge and leave marks.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas present for my Mom! It's okay it works fine but a little slow Mama likes her games!!!!
customer_reviews.author: donny weese

customer_reviews.title: Bogus tablet
customer_reviews.text: It was supposed to be upgraded from windows 8 to windows 10 They forgot to install the windows 10. Amazon and Dell will not install the windows 10, I had to returned it for a refund. What a waste of time , since I had purchase it for my 14 year old son's birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Wilfredo Velez

customer_reviews.title: Dell Venue 10 pro
customer_reviews.text: This tablet was shipped with Windows 8.1, not windows 10 as advertised. The free upgrade to Windows 10 ended July 29,2016. This tablet was delivered new and was not refurbished.
customer_reviews.author: surfzombie

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had it less than 1 month & it just quit. Unable to charge yuck
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: touchscreen isn't very responsive. did not come with windows 10 download
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My issue with it is really a Windows 10 issue ...
customer_reviews.text: My issue with it is really a Windows 10 issue than a tablet issue. Be sure to register the tablet with whatever email you will NEVER change and are ok with being open all the time in Outlook. You can't change the email address on the tablet or once registered with Windows...ever. Even a factory reset won't fix either. Spent quite a few hours on this since I bought the tablet for my mom not myself and was trying to set it up for her. A very frustrating few nights after work.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Majors

customer_reviews.title: ... up at times and isn't as fast as I'd like.
customer_reviews.text: Freezes up at times and isn't as fast as I'd like.
customer_reviews.author: Jods

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The touch screen does not respond as good as I have seen in others
